Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Oseas Corrales
Reviews.Content: The camera behaves as desired, good quality of photography and it handles ok. Definitively price and results are both a good ok for me

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: EM
Reviews.Content: I got this camera in blue from HSN.  I like it pretty well.  I Just learned how to use the zoom better.  It tells you how in the manual.  I paid $165 so this is a very good price.  It's easy to plug into the IMac to import the photos.  It's somewhat slim so it fits in my pocket.  It's a good camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
GE E1680W 16 MP 8x Optical/6x Digital Zoom Camera General Features:
Silver color with silver accents 16 megapixels effective
16.5 megapixels image sensor (1/2.33-inch CCD) 3.0-inch TFT color LCD (230,400 pixels)
Electronic Image stabilization Exif 2.2 (JPEG) still image files
H.264, Audio G.711 (monaural) movie files
ProductInfo.Name: GE E1680W 16MP 8x Optical 6x Digital Zoom Camera w HDMI Silver
